title: 1936년 Manske 사건
summary: 미국 Texas, TX 법원 판결 사건. 사건명: Manske. 판결일: 1936-02-12. 법원: Court of Criminal Appeals of Texas.
description:
## 사건 정보

**사건명**: MANSKE v. STATE
**판결일**: 1936-02-12
**법원**: Court of Criminal Appeals of Texas
**관할**: Texas, TX

**판사**: Christian

## 변호인

W. S. Leslie and E. E. Murphy, both of San Angelo, for appellant., Lloyd W. Davidson, State’s Atty., of Austin, for the State.

## 인용

- 91 S.W.2d 358

## 판결문 요약


CHRISTIAN, Judge.
The offense is possession of a still for manufacturing spirituous liquor capable of producing intoxication; the punishment, confinement in the penitentiary for two years.
Pending appeal, the law under which appellant was convicted has been repealed.
The judgment is-reversed, and the prosecution ordered dismissed.
PER CURIAM.
The foregoing opinion of the Commission of Appeals has been examined by the judges of the Court of Criminal Appeals and approved by the court.
...
